about_the_game:
We will show you a bloody good time. From established historical facts about the origins of vampire myths to lesser known information about the blood sucking creatures of nightmares this digital magazine will give you something to sink your teeth in if you are a fan of Count Dracula, Vlad the Impaler, Nosferatu or other sharp-fanged beasts.

Add to that an exiciting look behind the scenes of the development of the anticipated new game and get to know the lore of the fictitious Balkan area of Sangavia as well as the mysterious characters you are going to meet.

Enjoy the first issue free-of-charge! Further issues will be arriving in irregular intervals and subject to a charge.
